summary:
The name says it all. This mod turns every living thing into mudcrabs. It\'s like Planet of the apes, but with mudcrabs!

Have you ever wondered how it would be if you were a mudcrab? This mod holds the answer!
descriptionHtml:
The name says it all. This mod turns every living thing into mudcrabs. It\'s like Planet of the apes, but with mudcrabs!

Have you ever wondered how it would be if you were a mudcrab? This mod holds the answer!

This mod:
Changes every race into mudcrabs
You can still talk to people (mudcrabs) and they will do things as normal
The only things thats changed is how people and creatures look (like mudcrabs)

And the best part...
You (yes you) the player will also become a mudcrab

- - - - 
UPDATE: Added one Fox! But you will never find him.

-------------------------------------------
NOTE: There is currently a problem with starting a new game with this mod on. Using a saved file is working perfect!
author: Mosse
